headline: Cynthia Nixon to Direct Groundbreaking Play
abstract: The production, “Last Summer at Bluefish Cove” by Jane Chambers, is backed by producers including Ellen DeGeneres and Lily Tomlin.
lead_paragraph: Cynthia Nixon is set to direct a Broadway production of “Last Summer at Bluefish Cove,” Jane Chambers’s groundbreaking play that debuted Off Broadway in 1980. Ellen DeGeneres, Lily Tomlin, Harriet Newman Leve, Portia de Rossi and Jane Wagner will produce.
